sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'
import { Form } from 'semantic-ui-react'
import { setStatCalc } from '../../redux/actions'

export default function PointSpender(props) {
    const dispatch = useDispatch()
    const points = useSelector(state=> state.pointCalculator)
    let usedPoints = 0
    Object.keys(points).forEach(name => {usedPoints += points[name][0]})

    function handleChange(e){
        dispatch(setStatCalc(props.name, e.target.value.split(',').map(x => parseInt(x, 10))))
}

    return (
        <Form inverted>
            
            <Form.Field label={props.name + " Score:"} control='select' onChange={handleChange}>
            <option value='0,8'>8 (0 points)</option>
            <option value='1,9' placeholder='Disabled'>9 (1 point)</option>
            <option value='2,10'>10 (2 points)</option>
            <option value='3,11'>11 (3 points)</option>
            <option value='4,12'>12 (4 points)</option>
            <option value='5,13'>13 (5 points)</option>
            <option value='7,14'>14 (7 points)</option>
            <option value='9,15'>15 (9 points)</option>
            </Form.Field>
        </Form>
    )
}
